nodes.text: The Rawk compound was a property on the planet Kiffex located near the edge of the Wilds. Droo and "Bantha" Rawk were allowed to move into the compound by Sheyf Zharia Vos in 137 ABY after they fled from Imperial trouble on Iego. A large palace-like house dominated the compound, that included a kitchen, sleeping quarters, a workshop, and a sick bay. Cade Skywalker, Bantha Rawk's nephew, visited the compound in a desperate bid to get Droo to heal his mortally wounded friend Azlyn Rae.
